text: The application shall include a " Pay Again " button next to the existing " Send " button in the user interface that autofills the IBAN from the last successful transfer ( ensuring it passes format validation of 22 alphanumeric characters with a valid country checksum )
that autofills the IBAN from the last successful transfer
( ensuring it passes format validation of 22 alphanumeric characters with a valid country checksum )
it passes format validation of 22 alphanumeric characters with a valid country checksum

The application shall include a " Pay Again " button next to the existing " Send " button in the user interface that autofills the IBAN from the last successful transfer ( ensuring it passes format validation of 22 alphanumeric characters with a valid country checksum ) , enforces a maximum of 3 clicks per minute per user to prevent duplicate transfers , and is disabled by default if the last successful transfer occurred more than 30 days ago .
is disabled by default if the last successful transfer occurred more than 30 days ago
if the last successful transfer occurred more than 30 days ago
